name: Pipe Dreams!
description: A full-stack fuel finding application with authentication, an interactive map, and a message board built in.

name: TravelBuddy
description: A travel application which shows weather and activities in your selected city.

name: Password Generator
description: Select which character types to include and the length of your password, and this application will generate a random password. Use the Copy button to automatically copy the password to your clipboard!

name: README Generator
description: This tool, which runs in the terminal, prompts the user for information and generates a crisp README.md file for any project!
